title: राहुल गांधी ने जिन मज़दूरों के लिए कार का इंतज़ाम किया, उनकी तस्वीरें भ्रामक दावों से शेयर
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: Delhi: Congress leader Rahul Gandhi interacted with migrant labourers who were walking near Sukhdev Vihar flyover to return to their home states. Party volunteers later arranged vehicles to take them to their homes. A labourer, Monu says “Coming from Haryana,have to go to Jhansi” pic.twitter.com/SMbnejiZpK
